iam: I am a Front-end developer based in Landau, Germany. I help designers and companies to bring their ideas to real life. Creativity and logical thinking are skills that I have developed to connect ideas into quality products.
if: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
explore: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see myskills in action.
jointext: A task management board inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
ElPolloLocotext: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe against the evil killer chicken.
pokedextext: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokémon information.
discussANewProjekt: Want to discuss a new Project?
sayhello: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
